name: DnD AR
description:
With DnD AR you can enhance your tabletop experience: skip the hassle of buying minis and maps, and get right into the action. You can customize your map on the fly, manage combact, dice throws, and turns, simply by using a phone and QR codes.

This projects is an early prototype, but already includes the core experience.

Source code is available at: https://gitlab.com/Giovanni.Carnovale/DnDAR
